exercise

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • exercise.Question
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FreeText, MultipleAnswer, SingleAnswer, TrueFalse

    public abstract class Question
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Simon Valcarcel, Blanca Martin This abstract class makes reference to the Questions in an Exercise
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
